original_text: And when his armor-bearer saw that Saul was dead, he also fell upon his sword and died.
korean_text: 무기 가진 자가 사울이 죽는 것을 보고 자기도 칼에 엎드러져 죽으니라

sentences.original_text: And when his armor-bearer saw that Saul was dead
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 무기 맡은 자가 사울이 죽은 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: he also fell upon his sword
